mapper.sql: select id, mouse_code, mouse_name, species, gender, birth_date, weight, experiment_id, photo_url, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from t_mouse
mapper.select: select m.id, m.mouse_code, m.mouse_name, m.species, m.gender, m.birth_date, m.weight, m.experiment_id, m.photo_url, m.status, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark, e.experiment_name, u1.user_name as createByName, u2.user_name as updateByName from t_mouse m left join sys_experiment e on m.experiment_id = e.experiment_id left join sys_user u1 on m.create_by = u1.user_name left join sys_user u2 on m.update_by = u2.user_name where 1=1 and m.mouse_code like concat('%', #{mouseCode}, '%') and m.mouse_name like concat('%', #{mouseName}, '%') and m.species = #{species} and m.gender = #{gender} and m.status = #{status} and m.experiment_id = #{experimentId} and date_format(m.birth_date,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(m.birth_date,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y%m%d') order by m.create_time desc

select m.id, m.mouse_code, m.mouse_name, m.species, m.gender, m.birth_date, m.weight, m.experiment_id, m.photo_url, m.status, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark, e.experiment_name, u1.user_name as createByName, u2.user_name as updateByName from t_mouse m left join sys_experiment e on m.experiment_id = e.experiment_id left join sys_user u1 on m.create_by = u1.user_name left join sys_user u2 on m.update_by = u2.user_name where m.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_mouse
mouse_code, mouse_name, species, gender, birth_date, weight, experiment_id, photo_url, status, create_by, remark, create_time
#{mouseCode}, #{mouseName}, #{species}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{weight}, #{experimentId}, #{photoUrl}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, sysdate()
mapper.delete:
delete from t_mouse where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select id, mouse_code from t_mouse where mouse_code = #{mouseCode} limit 1

select m.id, m.mouse_code, m.mouse_name, m.species, m.gender, m.birth_date, m.weight, m.experiment_id, m.photo_url, m.status, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark, e.experiment_name, u1.user_name as createByName, u2.user_name as updateByName from t_mouse m left join sys_experiment e on m.experiment_id = e.experiment_id left join sys_user u1 on m.create_by = u1.user_name left join sys_user u2 on m.update_by = u2.user_name where m.mouse_code = #{mouseCode}
